verses.verse: "Let not your <S%G2588>heart<s%> be <S%G5015>troubled;<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> in <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in Me.

"In My Father's <S%G3614>house<s%> are <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3438>dwelling<s%> <S%G3438>places;<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it were not so, I would have <S%G3004>told<s%> you; for I <S%G4198>go<s%> to <S%G2090>prepare<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> for you.

"And <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G4198>go<s%> and <S%G2090>prepare<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> for you, I will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> and <S%G3880>receive<s%> you to <S%G1683>Myself;<s%> that <S%G3699>where<s%> I <S%G1510>am,<s%> [there] you may be <S%G2532>also.<s%>
"And you <S%G3609>know<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> I am <S%G5217>going.<s%>"

<S%G2381>Thomas<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> we do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> You are <S%G5217>going,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> do we <S%G3609>know<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G3598>way,<s%> and the <S%G225>truth,<s%> and the <S%G2222>life;<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> but <S%G1223>through<s%> Me.

<S%G1487>"If<s%> you had <S%G1097>known<s%> Me, you would have <S%G3609>known<s%> My <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>also;<s%> from <S%G737>now<s%> on you <S%G1097>know<s%> Him, and have <S%G3708>seen<s%> Him."
<S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1166>show<s%> us the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and it is <S%G714>enough<s%> for us."

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "Have I <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>long<s%> <S%G5550><s%> with you, and [yet] you have not come to <S%G1097>know<s%> Me, <S%G5376>Philip<s%>? He who has <S%G3708>seen<s%> Me has <S%G3708>seen<s%> the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> do you <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1166>'Show<s%> us the <S%G3962>Father<s%>'?

"Do you not <S%G4100>believe<s%> that I am in the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and the <S%G3962>Father<s%> is in Me? The <S%G4487>words<s%> that I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you I do not <S%G2980>speak<s%> on My <S%G1683>own<s%> <S%G1683>initiative,<s%> but the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3306>abiding<s%> in Me <S%G4160>does<s%> His <S%G2041>works.<s%>

<S%G4100>"Believe<s%> Me that I am in the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and the <S%G3962>Father<s%> in Me; <S%G7507>otherwise<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> on <S%G1223>account<s%> of the <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G846>themselves.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, he who <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Me, the <S%G2041>works<s%> that I <S%G4160>do<s%> shall he <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2548>also;<s%> and <S%G3173>greater<s%> [works] than <S%G3778>these<s%> shall he <S%G4160>do;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G4198>go<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

"And <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G302><s%> you <S%G154>ask<s%> in My <S%G3686>name,<s%> that will I <S%G4160>do,<s%> that the <S%G3962>Father<s%> may be <S%G1392>glorified<s%> in the <S%G5207>Son.<s%>
<S%G1437>"If<s%> you <S%G154>ask<s%> Me <S%G5100>anything<s%> in My <S%G3686>name,<s%> I will <S%G4160>do<s%> [it.]
<S%G1437>"If<s%> you <S%G25>love<s%> Me, you will <S%G5083>keep<s%> My <S%G1785>commandments.<s%>
"And I will <S%G2065>ask<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and He will <S%G1325>give<s%> you <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G3875>Helper,<s%> that He may be with you <S%G165>forever;<s%>

[that is] the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2983>receive,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> it does not <S%G2334>behold<s%> Him <S%G3761>or<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> Him, [but] you <S%G1097>know<s%> Him <S%G3754>because<s%> He <S%G3306>abides<s%> with you, and will be in you.
"I will not <S%G863>leave<s%> you as <S%G3737>orphans;<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> to you.

<S%G2089>"After<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G3398>while<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> will <S%G2334>behold<s%> Me <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more;<s%> but you [will] <S%G2334>behold<s%> Me; <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G2198>live,<s%> you shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>
"In that <S%G2250>day<s%> you shall <S%G1097>know<s%> that I am in My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and you in Me, and I in you.

"He who <S%G2192>has<s%> My <S%G1785>commandments<s%> and <S%G5083>keeps<s%> them, he it is who <S%G25>loves<s%> Me; and he who <S%G25>loves<s%> Me shall be <S%G25>loved<s%> by My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and I will <S%G25>love<s%> him, and will <S%G1718>disclose<s%> <S%G1683>Myself<s%> to him."

<S%G2455>Judas<s%> (not <S%G2469>Iscariot<s%>) <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> has <S%G1096>happened<s%> that You are <S%G3195>going<s%> to <S%G1718>disclose<s%> <S%G4572>Yourself<s%> to us, and not to the <S%G2889>world<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1437>"If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> Me, he will <S%G5083>keep<s%> My <S%G3056>word;<s%> and My <S%G3962>Father<s%> will <S%G25>love<s%> him, and We will <S%G2064>come<s%> to him, and <S%G4160>make<s%> Our <S%G3438>abode<s%> with him.

"He who does not <S%G25>love<s%> Me does not <S%G5083>keep<s%> My <S%G3056>words;<s%> and the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G191>hear<s%> is not <S%G1699>Mine,<s%> but the Father's who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me.
<S%G3778>"These<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to you, while <S%G3306>abiding<s%> with you.

"But the <S%G3875>Helper,<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> will <S%G3992>send<s%> in My <S%G3686>name,<s%> He will <S%G1321>teach<s%> you <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> and <S%G5279>bring<s%> to your <S%G5279>remembrance<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that I <S%G3004>said<s%> to you.

<S%G1515>"Peace<s%> I <S%G863>leave<s%> with you; My <S%G1515>peace<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> to you; not as the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1325>gives,<s%> do I <S%G1325>give<s%> to you. Let not your <S%G2588>heart<s%> be <S%G5015>troubled,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> let it be <S%G1168>fearful.<s%>

"You <S%G191>heard<s%> that I <S%G3004>said<s%> to you, 'I <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G5217>away,<s%> and I will <S%G2064>come<s%> to you.' <S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G25>loved<s%> Me, you would have <S%G5463>rejoiced,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G4198>go<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> for the <S%G3962>Father<s%> is <S%G3173>greater<s%> than I.

"And <S%G3568>now<s%> I have <S%G3004>told<s%> you <S%G4250>before<s%> it <S%G1096>comes<s%> to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> that <S%G3752>when<s%> it <S%G1096>comes<s%> to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> you may <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

"I will not <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> with you, for the <S%G758>ruler<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> is <S%G2064>coming,<s%> and he <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G3762><s%> in Me;

but that the <S%G2889>world<s%> may <S%G1097>know<s%> that I <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and as the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1781>gave<s%> Me <S%G1781>commandment,<s%> even <S%G3779>so<s%> I <S%G4160>do.<s%> <S%G1453>Arise,<s%> let us <S%G71>go<s%> from <S%G1782>here.<s%>
